name: Crafted_Edict_of_the_Master_D
display_name: Crafted Edict of the Master D
display_fullname: Boosts.Crafted Edict of the Master D
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Accuracy
